- Calculation of absolute frequencies <br> `table(x)`
- Calculation of relative frequencies <br>`prop.table(table(x))`
- marginal frequncies <br>`addmargins(x)`
- classification can be done with the functions cut() and seq(). cut() creats the groups, seq() creats the boarders, from which to which the Groups should be made
